message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:devonjones/PathfinderOpenReference

title: 1) Renamed Characters to Collections
message:
1) Renamed Characters to Collections
2) Collections appear in the list when created
3) Collections can be deleted
4) Create a "Default" collection on install
5) Collections now supported on 2.2+
6) Locked screen orientation to landscape for anything other then 3.0+
10" screens (technically, screens >= 800 pixels in the smallest
dimension that are also "XLarge"
7) configured to only support "Large" and "X-Large" screens
8) Fixed some database closings causing NPEs
